com.nokia.maps.component.feedback

Class RestrictMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.nokia.maps.component.feedback.RestrictMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent

    public class RestrictMapComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
    View Restriction Component blanks out the Map beyond a given boundary. This MapComponent which acts as an observer on the state of the attached map. The user is unable to view, pan or scale beyond a defined area of the map.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ID
      This constant defines a unique ID for the Map Restriction Component.
      static int UNRESTRICTED
      Used to leave the Map as unrestricted.

      • Fields inherited from class com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent

        map

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RestrictMapComponent(MapListener mapCanvas, RestrictMapEventListener eventListener)
      This method instantiates a new instance of a RestrictMapComponent, without an initial restriction being in place.
      RestrictMapComponent(MapListener mapCanvas, RestrictMapEventListener eventListener, GeoBoundingBox boundingBox)
      This method instantiates a new instance of a RestrictMapComponent, with the map restricted to a given bounding box.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestrictMapComponent

        public RestrictMapComponent(MapListener mapCanvas,
                    RestrictMapEventListener eventListener,
                    GeoBoundingBox boundingBox)
        This method instantiates a new instance of a RestrictMapComponent, with the map restricted to a given bounding box.
        Parameters:
        mapCanvas - the canvas to inform for repaints
        eventListener - callback function when an error occurs.
        boundingBox - the region to restrict the view to.

      • RestrictMapComponent

        public RestrictMapComponent(MapListener mapCanvas,
                    RestrictMapEventListener eventListener)
        This method instantiates a new instance of a RestrictMapComponent, without an initial restriction being in place.
        Parameters:
        mapCanvas - the canvas to inform for repaints
        eventListener - callback function when an error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
        This method renders the RestrictMapComponent using the Graphics object. A boundary box is rendered outside of the restricted area.
        Specified by:
        paint in interface MapComponent
        Overrides:
        paint in class AbstractMapComponent
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object used for rendering

      • mapUpdated

        public void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
        This method is called whenever the state of the map is altered. For the restrict component, there are two parts to this, observation of the map state (including necessary correction and feedback) and calculation of the restriction boundary.
        Specified by:
        mapUpdated in interface MapComponent
        Overrides:
        mapUpdated in class AbstractMapComponent
        Parameters:
        zoomChanged - whether the zoom level has been changed in the last map update.

      • attach

        public void attach(MapDisplay map)
        This method is called whenever the component is attached to a MapDisplay. . Assuming a bounding box has been set, update the current map state to force the map to lie within the defined boundary.
        Specified by:
        attach in interface MapComponent
        Overrides:
        attach in class AbstractMapComponent
        Parameters:
        map - the MapDisplay the component is attached to.

      • getBoundingBox

        public GeoBoundingBox getBoundingBox()

        Returns:

      • setBoundingBox

        This method sets the bounding box to restrict the map to.
